value.title: Working with Connected Field Service for Dynamics 365 and Azure IoT
value.excerpt: This learning path introduces you to connected Field Service and Azure IoT. Included in this learning path is identifying exceptions, register and manage devices, remotely monitor and service equipment, and using IoT central with connected Field Service.

topItems.title: Get started with Connected Field Service for Dynamics 365 and Azure IoT
topItems.excerpt: This module will focus on the initial deployment of the Connected Field Service add-on for Dynamics 365 for Field Service.  The module will walk you through the installation and an understanding of the components installed as part of the out of the box template application.

topItems.title: Remotely monitor and service equipment with Connected Field Service for Dynamics 365 and Azure IoT
topItems.excerpt: Configure IoT devices to remotely monitor customer equipment.

topItems.title: Register and manage devices with Connected Field Service for Dynamics 365 and Azure IoT
topItems.excerpt: Register and Manage Customer Devices with Connected Field Service.

topItems.title: Using IoT Central with Connected Field Service for Dynamics 365
topItems.excerpt: This module will focus on using IoT Central with Connected Field Service add-on for Dynamics 365 for Field Service.  The module will walk you through building an IoT Central application and escalating the alerts into Dynamics 365.

value.title: Analyze images with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: The Computer Vision service enables software engineers to create intelligent solutions that extract information from images; a common task in many artificial intelligence (AI) scenarios.

value.title: Manage non-relational data stores in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore non-relational data stores in Azure

value.title: Core Cloud Services - Azure networking options
value.excerpt: Get acquainted with Azure networking basics to find out how Azure networking helps improve resiliency and reduce latency.

value.title: Introduction to GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn to use key GitHub features, including issues, notifications, branches, commits, and pull requests.

value.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
value.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.

value.title: Azure Front Door Service (Preview) | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Sharad Agrawal joins Lara Rubbelke to discuss the recently announced Azure Front Door Service, which takes your application availability global and real-time while maximizing performance by connecting you to your users using Microsoft's massive global edge network. In this session, you'll learn how to

value.title: How to get started with Azure API Management | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to get started with Azure API Management, a service that helps protect and manage your APIs.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips     Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today

value.title: Is Azure Free Account really free? | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this video of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to use Microsoft Azure for free, for 12 months.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips  Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft Azure: http://azure.com/free

value.title: Create Intelligent Bots with the Azure Bot Service
value.excerpt: In this learning path, find out how to build a chat bot to interact with customers using text, graphics, or speech with extras from QnA Maker and LUIS.

topItems.title: Build a bot with QnA Maker and Azure Bot Service
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create a bot that answers frequently asked questions.

value.title: Analyze receipts with the Form Recognizer service
value.excerpt: Processing invoices and receipts is a common task in many business scenarios. Increasingly, organizations are turning to artificial intelligence (AI) to automate data extraction from scanned receipts.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Security
value.excerpt: Discover the tools that Azure provides to help you design a secure environment throughout your infrastructure, data, network, and applications.

value.title: Build a bot with QnA Maker and Azure Bot Service
value.excerpt: Learn how to create a bot that answers frequently asked questions.

value.title: Control Azure services with the CLI
value.excerpt: Learn the steps to install the Azure CLI locally, create a website, and manage Azure resources using the CLI.

value.title: Create a Linux virtual machine in Azure
value.excerpt: This module guides you through options for virtual machines in Azure, creating and connecting a Linux virtual machine, and configuring your network settings.

value.title: Explore relational data offerings in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore relational data offerings in Azure

value.title: Host a web application with Azure App service
value.excerpt: Create a website in the programming language of your choice through the hosted web app platform in Azure App Service.

value.title: Define identity and access management in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about identity and access management in Azure Active Directory and why identity is a core component of your organization’s security posture.

value.title: Manage virtual machines with the Azure CLI
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the cross-platform Azure CLI to create, start, stop, and perform other management tasks related to virtual machines in Azure.

value.title: Fundamentals of network security
value.excerpt: Explore the fundamentals of computer networking security and monitoring.

value.title: Secure your Azure SQL Database
value.excerpt: Secure an Azure SQL database to keep the information safe and diagnose potential security concerns as they happen.

value.title: Ingest, prepare & transform using Azure Databricks & Data Factory | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Today's business managers depend heavily on reliable data integration systems that run complex ETL/ELT workflows (extract, transform/load and load/transform data). Gaurav Malhotra joins Scott Hanselman to discuss how you can iteratively build, debug, deploy, and monitor your data integration workflows
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CZQOxPY7UuA" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: What can a managed identity be used for? | One Dev Question: Arturo Lucatero
value.excerpt: In the One Dev Question series, Arturo Lucatero, a Senior Program Manager working on managed identities for Azure resources, explains what you can do with a managed identity.   For more information, visit: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/managed-identities-azure-resources   Try Azure

value.title: Scale an App Service web app to efficiently meet demand with App Service scale up and scale out
value.excerpt: Learn how to respond to periods of increased activity by incrementally increasing the resources available and then freeing these resources when activity drops.

value.title: Build a scalable application with virtual machine scale sets
value.excerpt: Enable your application to automatically adjust to changes in load while minimizing costs with virtual machine scale sets.

value.title: Chain Azure Functions together using input and output bindings
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll learn how to integrate your Azure Function with various data sources by using bindings.

value.title: Classify images with the Custom Vision service
value.excerpt: Image classification is a common workload in artificial intelligence (AI) applications. It harnesses the predictive power of machine learning to enable AI systems to identify real-world items based on images.

value.title: Create a Clustering Model with Azure Machine Learning designer
value.excerpt: Clustering is an unsupervised machine learning technique used to group similar entities based on their features. Learn how to create clustering models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Create custom roles for Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)
value.excerpt: Learn how to create custom roles for Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC).

value.title: Create a Regression Model with Azure Machine Learning designer
value.excerpt: Regression is a supervised machine learning technique used to predict numeric values. Learn how to create regression models using Azure Machine Learning designer.
